I teach a AI course designed for a general audience, suitable for students from all majors.

## Description

The course will gently introduce foundational AI topics. It is co-taught with [Prof. Yajie Qin](https://bme-college.fudan.edu.cn/qyj/). I will be giving lectures on the following dates and topics.

This course takes place in H4201 every Friday afternoon (13:30-16:10) during the first semester of the 2025-2026 academic year.

## Schedule

| Week | Date | Plan |
|:----:|:----:|:--------:|
| **5** | 10/10/2025 | [Traditional AI](lecture_traditionalAI.pdf) |
| **6** | 10/17/2025 | [Artifical Neural Networks](lecture_ArtificalNeuralNetwork.pdf) | 
| **11** | 11/21/2025 | [Reinforcement Learning](lecture_ReinforcementLearning.pdf) | 
| **13** | 12/5/2025 | [Transformer](lecture_Transformer.pdf) |
| **15** | 12/19/2025 | Ethics and Safety |

The courses and teaching materials are mainly developed by [Prof. Xingjun Ma](https://cs.fudan.edu.cn/b7/70/c25925a440176/page.htm).
